channel.title: Please block my school from regestering!
channel.description:
Someone in my school is trying to spam up your website and I want to continue to have access to this site via my school.
To help you and me, can you block this IP from regestering accounts. Therefore I can access but no more spammers from my school can sign up.
Thank you, ada

item.title: Please block my school from regestering!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Sure, just give a link to his profile.

Read full topic
item.source: Please block my school from regestering!
